channel.title: Arceus
channel.description:
If anyone has an Arceus I would gladly give my left testicle and my soul for it. But seriously, if anyone has it I would love to trade for it. You would have to trade it via the WiFi thing.
ITT Last time you played pokemon and your highest pokemon.
ATM on Soul Silver it is a lvl 73 Ho-Oh, but I am training my Dragonite to be level 100. Dragonite lvl 79: 248 HP 283 Attack 172 Defense 235 Special Attack 165 Special Defense 168 Speed
Ho-Oh: 250 HP 231 Attack 162 Defense 152 Special Attack 251 Special Defense 152 Speed

item.title: Arceus
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:31, topic:419362”][quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=521909.msg3797314#msg3797314 date=1319748237]
Trust me, you don’t want hacked pokemon. It makes the game shit.
[/quote]
Not using him for stats or whatever. Using him to get Giratina which will make a godly wall on my team.

Where would I get one? Do I have to have Platinum or whatever to get him, or can I use it on Soul Silver? And does anyone have one that could just get me a Arceus real quick and give it to me for like an Eevee or something? Don’t have to level it using rare candies. I would rather it not be level 100 so I can EV train it.

I got one at GameStop some years back.

WTF is Arceus? and I’ll pwn anybody with level 100 Feraligatr. 1 hit your gay ass dragonite with ice punch,.

Is that a challenge?[/quote]

If I had Soul Silver and my level 100 Feraligatr it wouldn’t be a challenge, it would be a cake-walk. I have him on my GBA Silver that I seem to have lost…

Read full topic

item.title: Arceus
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:18, topic:419362”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=521909.msg3795784#msg3795784 date=1319598500]

No buying/selling anything on this site, remember?

We aren’t buying anything. We are trading pokemon.

That’s a card game, … I’m so confused. Your selling (TRADING) pokemon. You could still get scammed from this I guess… so maybe it would fall under that category? Dunno, have fun trading pokemons though.

It’s a game on the DS. Not a card game. And if I get scammed out of a Arceus I demand my left testicle back.

How do you sell stuff off a DS?
[/quote]
We aren’t selling anything… You go into a pokecenter and go to the WiFi trading thing. You then trade with anyone around the world. This is why I said we aren’t buying/selling anything.

@Action replay: What’s that?[/quote]
Thats what he meant by getting it via “Hacking”

You can just get it in like 1 minute, and level it to 100 via rare candies…

They cost like 20 bucks and they work for more games and you can catch any pkmn i think

Read full topic
